ovdesc.p: This file is used to update the Accounts Arrangement details and used to get the calculated APYE value for an particular account.

desc.p: Valid AA.PRODUCT.LINE Id.
Whether interest calculated on Daily Balance or on Average Daily Balance. Alpha Numeric with 7 characters
Statement Period Start Date.Date type field with length of 11 characters
Statement Period End Date.Date type field with length of 11 characters
Avarage Balance for statement period. AMT field with 18 characters
Interest earned during this period (either accrued/capitalised). AMT field with 18 characters.
Total number of days in this period. Numeric value with 5 characters.
Update the calculated APYE value. Rate value with 4 characters.
Current Outstanding Balance for the Account.
This field contains the interest accrued for the account from Year start to date.
This field contains the charge amount of lending contract.
This field contains the unamortized fees amount of lending contract.
This field contains the charge amount of lending contract.
This field contains interest paid on a loan and not the accrued interest till the date .
This field contains interest paid on a loan for last year.
This field contains late charges paid for a loan till the date.
This field contains overdue status of a loan contract.
This field holds the number of times a loan contract moved to particular overdue status.
Shows the balance amount of loan or account overdraft balance amount.
No input Field.
Numeric 20 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
Shows the un advanced amount for loans.
Amount 19 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
shows the loan to value for third party system
Amount 19 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
Shows the Accrued unpaid interest amount for accounts and deposits.
Amount 19 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
Shows the current year tax amount paid for accounts and deposits
Amount 19 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
Shows the Last year paid interest tax amount for accounts and deposits.
Amount 19 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
Shows the Last interest paid date for deposits and accounts.
Amount 19 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
Shows the next interest payment date for deposits and accounts.
Amount 19 Characters.
Standard Amount Format with 2 decimals.
